content.rendered: The theme of this HIBIKI 30 years old bottle is “KACHO FUGETSU”.The design embodies the beauty of Japanese nature. Hibiki 30 year old is the cream of crop. It was awarded the Trophy at the International Spirits Challenge in 2004,2006 and 2008. And the coveted title “World’s Best Blended Whisky” at the World Whiskies Award 2007 and 2008.

excerpt.rendered:
Distillery Hibiki
Age 30 Year Old
Whisky Origin Japan
Region Japan
ABV 43%
Bottle Size 70cl
